product_name: Arc'teryx Gamma LT Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: The Arc'teryx Gamma LT hoodie jacket is here to make your outdoor activities a little more comfortable, warding off wind and rain to help you feel good from the trailhead to the top of the mountain. Constructed with an extremely durable non-insulated soft-shell fabric with a soft inner face, it's a jacket that adapts itself well to 3-season conditions. Burly(TM) Double Weave is a durable, water- and wind-resistant fabric with 4-way stretch for comfort and a Durable Water Repellent finish that sheds light precipitation. Helmet-compatible Storm Hood(TM) easily adjusts for a snug fit that retains full visibility. Underarm gusset ensures full range of motion without the jacket riding up. Wind flap behind the front zipper prevents wind from sneaking in. 2 zippered hand pockets sit high on the torso for harness and pack compatibility; 1 zippered interior pocket secure small essentials. Arc'teryx Gamma LT hoodie has a slim, athletic fit for efficient movement.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Gamma LT hoodie jacket is here to make your outdoor activities a little more comfortable, warding off wind and rain to help you feel good from the trailhead to the top of the mountain.
